titleStmt.title: An Encoding of Sylvia Beach's Logbook for the Year 1928

event.p: S. Gotman 1m 2vols 35 D65 will pay next time
S. Miss M. Nelson 1m 2 vols 35 D100
D.R. Forwood 50 gave too much on check
S. Curtiss 1m 1vol 25 will bring d next time
S Mlle Maury 6m 1vol 100 d50f for postage
refunded Cohen subs & dep. (add too far away)
D.R. Vinal 50 (given to Mlle Passedoit who is going to America)
refunded Miss Grant 20f = subs Prof's discount
S Ketch 3m 2vols 85 D50 will bring extra next time
S Stokes 1m 2vols 35 D100 (will bring next time 2d deposit)
